languages.text: {n}Арджента заметно мрачнеет.{/n} "Впервые я появилась здесь, когда мне требовалось добраться от {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g} до одной окраинной планеты. Но, верно, вопрос не о том, первом путешествии, а о том, как я попала сюда перед нападением культистов. Это непростая история. Так случилось, что я..." {n}— она осекается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента заметно мрачнеет.{/n} "Впервые я появилась здесь, когда мне требовалось добраться от Футфола до одной окраинной планеты. Но, верно, вопрос не о том, первом путешествии, а о том, как я попала сюда перед нападением пиратов. Это непростая история. Так случилось, что я..." {n}— она осекается.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的表情明显变得黯淡下来。{/n}“我第一次上她的船，是为了从{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}前往某颗偏僻的行星。但我猜，你感兴趣的并不是我的第一次旅行，而是在异端分子袭击之前，我出于什么原因上了她的船。这个故事很复杂，我当时只是碰巧……”{n}她突然顿住了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的表情明显变得黯淡下来。{/n}“我第一次上她的船，是为了从{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}前往某颗偏僻的行星。但我猜，你感兴趣的并不是我的第一次旅行，而是在海盗袭击之前，我出于什么原因上了她的船。这个故事很复杂，我当时只是碰巧……”{n}她突然顿住了。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from Footfall to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the pirate attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se oscurece visiblemente.{/n} «Vine en primer lugar cuando necesité transporte desde {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} a un planeta remoto. Pero imagino que no le interesa tanto el primer viaje como el que me trajo a bordo antes del ataque de los cultistas. Es una historia complicada. El caso es que...». {n}Se detiene.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se oscurece visiblemente.{/n} «Vine en primer lugar cuando necesité transporte desde {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} a un planeta remoto. Pero imagino que no le interesa tanto el primer viaje como el que me trajo a bordo antes del ataque pirata. Es una historia complicada. El caso es que...». {n}Se detiene.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が目に見えて暗くなる。{/n}「私が最初にここに来たのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}から辺境の惑星への航路が必要になったときだった。だが、あなたが興味を持っているのは、その最初の旅ではなく、むしろ教団の襲撃の前に私が乗船する契機となったものなのだろう。その話は複雑だ。たまたま私が…」{n}彼女は短く言葉を切った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が目に見えて暗くなる。{/n}「私が最初にここに来たのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}から辺境の惑星への航路が必要になったときだった。だが、あなたが興味を持っているのは、その最初の旅ではなく、むしろ教団の襲撃の前に私が乗船する契機となったものなのだろう。その話は複雑だ。たまたま私が…」{n}彼女は短く言葉を切った。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Miene verdüstert sich merklich.{/n} "Ich kam erstmals her, als ich von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} auf einen abgelegenen Planeten reisen musste. Doch Euch interessiert vermutlich weniger diese erste Reise und mehr, was mich vor dem Kultistenangriff an Bord geführt hatte. Diese Geschichte ist kompliziert. Ich war zufällig ..." {n}Sie verstummt abrupt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Miene verdüstert sich merklich.{/n} "Ich kam erstmals her, als ich von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} auf einen abgelegenen Planeten reisen musste. Doch Euch interessiert vermutlich weniger diese erste Reise und mehr, was mich vor dem Piratenangriff an Bord geführt hatte. Diese Geschichte ist kompliziert. Ich war zufällig ..." {n}Sie verstummt abrupt.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit perceptiblement.{/n} « Je suis montée à bord pour la première fois lorsque j'ai dû quitter {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} pour rejoindre une planète reculée. Mais j'imagine que ce qui vous intéresse n'est pas ce premier voyage, mais plutôt ce qui m'a poussée à embarquer avant l'attaque des cultistes. C'est une histoire compliquée. Il se trouve que je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt d'un coup.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression darkens visibly.{/n} "I first came here when I found myself in need of passage from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} to a remote planet. But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit perceptiblement.{/n} « Je suis montée à bord pour la première fois lorsque j'ai dû quitter {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} pour rejoindre une planète reculée. Mais j'imagine que ce qui vous intéresse n'est pas ce premier voyage, mais plutôt ce qui m'a poussée à embarquer avant l'attaque des pirates. C'est une histoire compliquée. Il se trouve que je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt d'un coup.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne bir karaltı çöküyor.{/n} "Buraya, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'dan{/g} uzaktaki bir gezegene gitmem gerektiği için gelmiştim. Fakat senin ilgini çeken, bu ilk yolculuğumdan ziyade tarikatçıların saldırısından evvel burada bulunma sebebim olmalı. Hikâyenin o kısmı biraz karışık. Öyle ki..." {n}Lafını yarıda bırakıyor.{/n}

But I imagine what interests you is not that first journey, but rather what brought me aboard prior to the cultist attack. That story is complicated. It just so happened that I..." {n}She stops short.{/n}
